item.title: Backup and Import Intune Device Configuration Profiles

item.title: Breaking Down Custom OMA-URI (CSP) Policies
item.description: What is an OMA-URI Policy? Meaning: Open Mobile Alliance Uniform Resource Identifier Traditionally when you implement a new piece of software which contains Group Policy Objects (GPO’s) to customise the feature of the application you would import the .
